p: Finally, we calculated the mean decrease in node impurity of a trained RF analysis (randomForest in R) with 100 trees generated. This test allowed us to determine which variable and covariable contributed strongly to the tree construction ( 61). Variables that contributed less to the model were removed from the analysis. Overall, there was high agreement among the PCA, ANN, and RF in identifying important variables. All spatial procedures were conducted in ArcGIS 10.2.2 and R.
